name: Blue Chip Marketing
description: We are Blue Chip. We are consumer marketing experts for brands and retailers with an enviable reputation for results and over 100 awards for effectiveness. We can help you drive people to positive action, whether that’s to try, buy, stay with, love or share your brand. From sofa to store, we’ll also help you pick the right mix of touchpoints, content and comms to engage your audience in the most cost-effective and efficient way possible.
